entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, -0.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon then periods of drizzle. Fog patches developing this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to freezing rain near midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Fog patches. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Freezing rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023
